name: Ethio Logo Quiz: የኢትዮጲያ ጨዋታ
description:
Ethio Logo Quiz Game 

Are Ethiopian and Do you like logo trivia guessing games? Then Ethio Logo Quiz Game: Guess Ethiopian and Others Famous Brand Quiz Game is for you! Guess the names of hundreds of popular logos from Ethiopia and all over the world. Ethio Logo Quiz Game has the largest collection of Logos from Ethiopia

Ethio Logo Quiz Game:

★ More than 500 logos organized in over 30 Levels!

★ High-quality graphics.

★ Logos Arranged Well

★ Amharic and English 

★ Uses hints and clues in difficult levels

★ Recognize and guess more logos to unlock new levels

★ Ask your Facebook or telegram friends for help when you’re stuck on a logo puzzle!

★ High-quality graphics.

★ Great logo, word, and trivia game for the whole family!

★ Fun logo, trivia, and word quiz to stimulate your brain and help with memory!

★ The difficulty increases as the game progresses

★ 2 Ethiopian 1 Other Logos level Arrange

ኢትዮጲያን አማረኛ የስልክ ጫዋታዎች በBinary አቢሲቢያ
